action.action-desc: Mr. King of Iowa introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration

form.official-title: To authorize the Capitol Police to enforce the immigration laws, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Ending the Sanctuary Capitol Policy Act of 2017.

section.header: Capitol police authorized to enforce the immigration laws
